title: Bug 16013Working Set icon displayed as red square
OB: Bug 16013Working Set icon displayed as red square There seems to be a problem with the working set icon: a red square is showninstead of the icon.Note:1) since it is now read it picks up the icon declaration2) the icon (path) I use is copied from another icon declaration where the iconshows upTherefore I assume there's a problem in the code which picks up the icon.My working set declaration is:<extension point="org.eclipse.ui.workingSets"<workingSetid="org.eclipse.jdt.ui.JavaWorkingSetPage"name="%JavaWorkingSetPage.name"icon="icons/full/obj16/jcuobj.gif"pageClass="org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.workingsets.JavaWorkingSetPage"</workingSet</extension
